name: Sesame Gochujang
description: Our hearty Gochujang loaf is made with a handsome amount of garlic confit, onion puree, green onions, and gochujang. All topped with Organic Sesame Seeds.

name: Focaccia
description: Our focaccia is cultured with poolish and it contains Bread Flour, Spelt, Hard Red Flour, Hard White Flour, Olive Oil, topped with Maldon Salt.

name: Black Sesame
description: A hearty Loaf made with Hard Red flour action packed with Organic Black Sesame Seeds inside and out.

name: Country Sourdough
description: A classic organic Country Loaf made with Bread flour, Hard Red Spring and Rye.

name: Rosemary Polenta
description: Cooked down Porridge with toasted Organic Cornmeal, and Rosemary added to our Country Loaf gives it a creamy texture yet popcornlike aroma.

name: Rustic Baguette
description: Our rustic baguettes are leavened with spelt poolish and sourdough culture for a more complex finish.

name: Ciabatta Grande
description: Our light and crisp Ciabatta Grande is made with a blend of Bread Flour, Spelt Flour, and Hard Red Flour

name: Fougasse
description: A fun pretzel like bread to tear apart and eat. Made with a blend of Bread Flour, Spelt Flour, and Hard Red Flour topped with Olive Oil, Maldon Sea Salt.
